headline.main: U.S.-Japan Talks Should Avoid Fiscal, Monetary Policy Meddle: Amari
headline.print_headline: U.S.-Japan Talks Should Avoid Fiscal, Monetary Policy Meddle: Amari

lead_paragraph: Japan and the United States should avoid trying to interfere with each other's fiscal and monetary policies when they start bilateral economic talks next month, former Japanese economy minister Akira Amari said on Monday.
snippet: Japan and the United States should avoid trying to interfere with each other's fiscal and monetary policies when they start bilateral economic talks next month, former Japanese economy minister Akira Amari said on Monday....
